content: Open the report below to see what data is included. Error reports do not contain any personal data of the users. To help our team better understand the problem, describe it in the free form using the comment field.

comment.text: This translation key is used for an error report description, guiding users to view a report that contains no personal data and providing an opportunity to describe the issue in free form. It appears on a modal dialog header, prompting users to explore the report further.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to see what data is included" is not accurately translated. "Hansı məlumatın daxil olduğunu görmək üçün" literally translates to "To see what information is included." It's acceptable but could be more natural. A better phrasing might convey the purpose of opening the report.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Açılan hesabatdakı məlumatları görmək üçün (To see the information in the opened report)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "describe it in the free form using the comment field" is somewhat awkwardly translated. The current translation, "şərh sahəsindən istifadə edərək məsələni aydın şəkildə təsvir edin," is accurate but slightly verbose and a bit formal for a user-facing message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Məsələni şərh sahəsində izah edin (Explain the issue in the comment field).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'free form' is not accurately translated. 'Στη φόρμα' (sti forma) literally translates to 'in the form' and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'free form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αναγράψτε το ελεύθερα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Avaan alla oleva raportti nähdäksesi sisällön' is grammatically awkward. The verb 'Avaan' (I open) is incorrect in this context. A more appropriate phrasing would be 'Voit avata alla oleva raportti...' (You can open the report below...) or 'Avaa alla oleva raportti...' (Open the report below...).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Avaa alla oleva raportti nähdäksesi sisällön.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to see what data is included" is somewhat literal. A more natural translation might be "to see what information is included" or "to view the included information".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Բացեք ստորև ներկայացված հաշվետվությունը՝ տեսնելու, թե ինչ տեղեկություններ են ներառված:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "help our team better understand the problem" can be improved for flow.  A more natural translation would incorporate a more direct causal relationship.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Որպեսզի մեր թիմը հասկանի խնդիրը ավելի լավ, նկարագրեք այն անվճար ձևով՝ օգտագործելով մեկնաբանությունների դաշտը:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To help our team better understand the problem" is translated as "私たちのチームが問題をよりよく理解するために". While grammatically correct, it sounds overly formal and somewhat stiff in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would be something like "チームが問題を把握しやすくするために" (to make it easier for the team to grasp the problem).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: チームが問題を把握しやすくするために

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "describe it in the free form using the comment field" is translated as "コメント欄を使ってフリーフォームで問題を記述して頂ければ幸いです".  'フリーフォーム' (free form) is a direct transliteration and might not be readily understood by all Japanese users. A more natural and clear phrasing would be "コメント欄に自由に記述してください" (please describe freely in the comment field).  The "頂ければ幸いです" (it would be appreciated) is also quite formal and can be softened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コメント欄に自由に記述してください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '頂ければ幸いです' makes the sentence feel very long and verbose. Breaking up the sentence into two shorter sentences would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コメント欄を使って問題を記述してください。記述していただけると、チームが問題をよりよく理解するのに役立ちます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເປີດບົດລາຍງານຂ້າງລຸ່ມນີ້ເພື່ອເບິ່ງວ່າມີຂໍ້ມູນຫຍັງແດ່" (Open the report below to see what data is included) is a bit clunky. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດບົດລາຍງານດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້ເພື່ອສັງເກດຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ມີຢູ່

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ອະທິບາຍໄດ້ຕາມໃຈ" (describe it as you wish) is a bit too informal for the context of a formal error report. It could be misinterpreted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອະທິບາຍບັນຫານີ້ຢ່າງລະອຽດດ້ວຍການໃຊ້ຄໍາເຫັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizatorilor' is used incorrectly. It should be 'utilizator'. While 'utilizatorilor' means 'of users', the correct phrasing here refers to the users themselves.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: utilizator

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'în forma liberă' is not the most natural way to express 'free form' in this context. It sounds a bit stiff and formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: în câmpul de comentarii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To help our team better understand the problem" is awkwardly translated as "ඔන්ලිඔෆිස් කණ්ඩායමට ගැටලුව වඩාත් හොඳින් අවබෝධ කර ගැනීම සඳහා". 'OnlyOffice' seems to have been inserted incorrectly. It should refer to 'our team'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔවුන්ගේ කණ්ඩායමට ගැටලුව වඩාත් හොඳින් අවබෝධ කර ගැනීම සඳහා

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "describe it in the free form" is translated as "ආකෘතිපත්‍රයේ විස්තර කරන්න". The word 'ආකෘතිපත්‍රයේ' (in the form) isn't appropriate here; it implies a specific form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නිදහස් ආකාරයෙන් විස්තර කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ගේ' has a minor typo. It should be 'පරිශ්‍රමිකයන්ගේ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රමිකයන්ගේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'poličke Komentár' (comment box) is awkward. 'Poličke' is genitive case and doesn't fit the context of a field label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otvorte hlásenie nižšie, aby ste zistili, aké údaje obsahuje. Hlásenie chyby neobsahuje žiadne osobné údaje používateľov. Ak chcete pomôcť nášmu tímu lepšie pochopiť problém, popíšte ho vo voľnej forme v poli 'Komentár'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'voli forme' is a more literal translation. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak chcete pomôcť nášmu tímu lepšie pochopiť problém, popíšte ho slobodnou formou v poli 'Komentár'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'report below' is awkwardly translated as 'извештај испод'. A more natural phrasing would be 'нижи извештај' or 'приложен извештај'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отворите приложени извештај да бисте видели које податке укључује.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'izveštaj' is spelled correctly, but it could be improved for clarity. While technically accurate, 'prijavi greške' (error report) might be more idiomatic in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'prijavi greške' instead of 'izveštaj' for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Kako biste našem timu pomogli da bolje razume problem' is grammatically correct but slightly verbose.  A more concise and common phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Kako biste naš tim bolje razumeo problem...' or 'Da bi naš tim bolje razumeo problem...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "free form" is not accurately translated. 'Düz yazı' is a reasonable attempt but could be more precise. A better translation might emphasize unstructured input.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use a phrase like 'serbest metin' or 'yapılandırılmamış bir şekilde' to better convey the meaning of 'free form'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "xin hãy" (please) sounds overly formal in this context. It can be omitted or replaced with a more casual alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy mô tả nó trong biểu mẫu tự do bằng cách sử dụng trường nhận xét.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'free form' as 'biểu mẫu tự do' is technically correct but can be more naturally expressed as 'tự do nhập'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy mô tả nó trong biểu mẫu bằng cách sử dụng trường nhận xét.
